name: uhgrspanop
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(cop(c1, cres(c2, c3)), cuhgr))

⊢ (c0 ∈ UHGraph → < c1,(c2 |` c3)> ∈ UHGraph)

⊣ (c0 ∈ UHGraph →(Vtx ` < c1,(c2 |` c3)>)= c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UHGraph →(iEdg ` < c1,(c2 |` c3)>)=(c2 |` c3))

comment: A spanning subgraph of a hypergraph represented by an ordered pair is a hypergraph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 27-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 11-Oct-2020.)
